metadata.title: CVE-2021-43455 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - negligible.
metadata.description: An Unquoted Service Path vulnerability exists in FreeLAN 2.2 via a specially crafted file in the FreeLAN Service path.

notes.note: seth-arnold> looks like a windows fault

criterions.comment: freelan: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
